nodes.text: Master Sergeant was a military rank in the Galactic Republic, the reconstituted Sith Empire, the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It was also a rank used by the Corellian Security Force and the Royal Naboo Security Forces.

In the Alliance Army, the Master Sergeant rank was used among Special Forces. A Master Sergeant typically served as the second-in-command of a platoon, and as the adjutant to the unit's commanding Lieutenant. It was equivalent ot the regular Rebel army, Imperial Army and Stormtrooper Corps Sergeant major. In the Imperial Military, a Senior Master Sergeant rank existed in the Starfighter Corps.
During the Old Republic era, Korum, Nattis, Payne, and Hayg served as Master Sergeants in the Sith Imperial Military.
Centuries later, Crowley had held the rank in the Republic Army. Jai Raventhorn was a Master Sergeant in the Rebel Alliance Infiltrators, and Kine in the Stormtrooper Corps.
